summary: Filmmaker Barbet Schroeder explores themes of sexual freedom, mind alteration, and pursuit of paradise against the backdrop of an early 70's encounter with the Mapuga rain forest tribe in upland New Guinea.
cast: Bulle Ogier|Jean-Pierre Kalfon|Michael Gothard|Valérie Lagrange|Monique Giraudy|Jérôme Beauvarlet|Bob Mac Kay|Charles Ivano|The Mapuga Tribe and its Chiefs
keywords: ambiguous ending|actual animal killed|looking at oneself in a mirror|purchase|dead animal
title: El valle
